source_reference.text: How to Put God First in Your Life, Relationships, and In All Things (Video by ApplyGodsWord_MarkBallenger)

content_summary:
"Putting God first" is a phrase that is easy to use incorrectly. While God wants to be first, he does not want to be in a box, even if this is your most important box. Putting God first is about seeking to please God in every area of life. 

AGW University: Relationship Training for Christian Singles: https://agwuniversity.teachable.com/ 

Article, "Stop Putting God First to Find a Spouse" http://applygodsword.com/putting-god-...

FREE eBook: The Ultimate Guide to Christian Singleness: http://applygodsword.com/christian-si...
